oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reminiscence of the Battle of Shiloh
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This handwritten account of the Battle of Shiloh was recorde by Pvt. Thomas J. Watkins, Co. H, 4th Tenn. Inf. (Neely's), CSA, 52 years after the battle. The account ends abruptly after 15 pages. The donor contributed a transcript (see additional material) that contains the remainder of the memoir. It picks up on page 6 where the handwritten version ends.
